articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump says he doesn't want Somalis in the U.S., urges them to go back to their homeland and fix it - NPR
articles.description: President Trump says he doesn't want Somali immigrants in the U.S., saying residents of the war-ravaged eastern African country are too reliant on U.S. social safety net and add little to the U.S.
articles.content: President Donald Trump on Tuesday said he did not want Somali immigrants in the U.S., saying residents of the war-ravaged eastern African country are too reliant on U.S. social safety net and add lit… [+3697 chars]
